name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven R&D Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full stack development, proficient in delivering innovative solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. Skilled in **Python**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, and **FastAPI**, particularly in the design and implementation of AI/LLM pipelines and real-time services. Deep understanding of **APIs** development and adherence to SDLC best practices, fostering robust software development processes. Actively utilizing **Git** for version control and deploying CI/CD practices to ensure seamless integration and delivery of applications. 

Demonstrated success in cloud deployment across **AWS** and **Azure** environments, alongside a strong foundation in building and managing high-performance applications. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Exceptional communication skills in English, aimed at fostering collaborative innovation consulting within diverse teams.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and implemented **real-time services** for healthcare and fintech applications using **Python (FastAPI)**, adhering to industry standards.
- Designed backend **APIs** and integrated them with cutting-edge frameworks such as **React** and **Next.js** for dynamic user interfaces.
- Enhanced **CI/CD** processes by creating efficient pipelines utilizing Git and cloud deployment strategies, ensuring seamless integration and delivery.
- Championed innovation consulting initiatives by leading teams through the **SDLC** phases, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technical feasibility.
- Applied expertise in **AI/LLM pipelines** to build intelligent features in applications, enhancing user experiences with predictive analytics.
- Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to ensure effective **English communication** throughout project development, achieving clarity and precision in technical documentation.
- Conducted extensive testing using modern methodologies to ensure software robustness, employing frameworks and tools such as Jest and PyTest for effective assurance.
- Managed deployment workflows and version control using Git, optimizing team efficiency and project collaboration.
- Guided the development of scalable cloud solutions, ensuring high availability and performance of applications in production.
- Empowered teams with hands-on experience in emerging technologies, facilitating opportunities for professional growth and continuous learning.

Leveraged **Python** and **FastAPI** to develop innovative APIs for seamless integration within real-time services, enhancing system efficiency and user experience.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)** and **Next.js**, incorporating **TypeScript** for type safety and utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design across **3** financial tool interfaces.
Designed and implemented **AI/LLM pipelines** to enhance data processing and analysis, tapping into the power of machine learning to improve operational efficiencies.
Developed a comprehensive SDLC adhering to best practices and integrating with **Git** for version control and **CI/CD** practices, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment times.
Created real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and Power BI Embedded, improving insights delivery speed to operations teams by **50%**.
Architected an event-driven system leveraging **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to manage critical workflows in payments and alerts, ensuring reliable and efficient data communication.
Executed data pipeline projects using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** to ingest and process financial data, achieving an overall data processing efficiency improvement of **40%**.
Deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, contributing to a **25%** increase in early detection rates of suspicious activities.
Engaged in innovation consulting and effective **English communication** to ensure alignment of technological advancements with business objectives.

- Developed and optimized APIs for e-commerce applications using **Python** frameworks (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **React** to ensure peak performance, supporting over **10,000** concurrent users during major sales events.
- Built and maintained real-time services using **WebSockets** and event-driven architectures supported by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, achieving latency reductions to below **100ms** for order updates and customer interactions.
- Streamlined the SDLC process by utilizing **Git** for version control and implementing CI/CD pipelines, improving deployment frequency by **50%** and reducing production bugs by **30%**.
- Designed adaptable web application frontends using **React** (**React 18**), **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, enhancing UX with mobile-first responsiveness and achieving **90%+** Lighthouse scores for performance.
- Integrated AI/LLM pipelines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, driving a **15%** increase in conversion rates through personalized recommendations based on behavioral analytics.
- Employed cloud deployment strategies for scalability and reliability, ensuring the platform is prepared to handle up to **5,000** transactions per minute during peak hours.
- Championed innovation consulting by proposing and implementing new technologies that aligned with business goals, resulting in a **20%** acceleration in time-to-market for new features.
- Fostered strong English communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and present technical solutions effectively, enhancing project transparency and stakeholder engagement.
- Ensured secure, compliant system architecture through the implementation of **OAuth 2.0** and role-based access control (RBAC), adhering to GDPR standards and best practices for data protection.
